Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties

Interface EntityPropertyBindingContextResolver

All Superinterfaces:
EntityPropertyBindingContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChildEntityPropertyBindingContext, SimpleEntityPropertyBindingContext
public interface EntityPropertyBindingContextResolver extends EntityPropertyBindingContext
Can be implemented by a EntityPropertyBindingContext to query for a property binding context and optionally load it if not available.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

  • Method Details

    • resolvePropertyBindingContext

      EntityPropertyBindingContext resolvePropertyBindingContext(@NonNull @NonNull EntityPropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, boolean createIfPossible)
      Resolve a EntityPropertyBindingContext for a specific child property. Optionally specify if the context should be created if it can be. When false only a pre-existing binding context would be returned. Useful for bulk fetching scenarios where an external process might create the binding context and then eagerly load the values.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - representing the property
      createIfPossible - true if a binding context should be created if it can be, false if
      Returns:
      binding context for the property, null if not found

    • registerPropertyBindingContext

      EntityPropertyBindingContext registerPropertyBindingContext(@NonNull @NonNull EntityPropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, Object propertyValue)
      Register a property binding context for the specific child property, with the initial property value.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - representing the property
      propertyValue - current property value
      Returns:
      binding context for the property

    • resolvePropertyBindingContext

      static Map<EntityPropertyBindingContext,EntityPropertyBindingContext> resolvePropertyBindingContext(Collection<EntityPropertyBindingContext> parents, EntityPropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor)
      Resolves the property binding contexts for a given property descriptor and a collection of entity binding contexts, and will do so in the most efficient way possible. Will use bulk fetching if the property controller claims it is optimized for that.
      Parameters:
      parents - binding context list
      propertyDescriptor - for the property
      Returns:
      map of original binding context (value) by resolved property binding context (key)

    • resolvePropertyBindingContext

      static EntityPropertyBindingContext resolvePropertyBindingContext(EntityPropertyBindingContext parent, EntityPropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor)
      Resolve a the binding context for a property of a parent binding context.
      Parameters:
      parent - binding context
      propertyDescriptor - for which the binding context should be resolved
      Returns:
      binding context for the property
